ResearchProjectDef.label: Mechadroids: Alphas
ResearchProjectDef.description: Fabricate advanced robots from salvaged mechanoid materials. Alphas are a baseline for the units with no particular specialisation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mechadroids: Gammas
ResearchProjectDef.description: Fabricate advanced robots from salvaged mechanoid materials. Gammas are weaker but more intelligent variants.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mechadroids: Deltas
ResearchProjectDef.description: Fabricate advanced robots from salvaged mechanoid materials. Deltas are a less intelligent but stronger variant.
